ComicInfo.Summary:
“THE DEADLY DEMON KING”
The buildup to SAVAGE DRAGON #250 begins here! Introducing the maddening menace of the deadly Demon King—a great jumping-on point for new readers!
*Contents* Modern Warfare Aquaria in Atlantis Avenue The Funnies: Eat More Bikes The Funnies: Kevin Days A Week The Funnies: Berkeley Mews The Funnies: Moonbeard The Funnies: Heck If I Know COmics The Funnies: Foxy
